text: Karl Martin Lauer (2 January 1937 - 6 October 2019) was a West German sprinter. He won a gold medal in the 4 Ã— 100 m relay at the 1960 Summer Olympics. He was born in Cologne, Nordrhein-Westfalen. Lauer died on 6 October 2019 at the age of 82.Martin Lauer's obituary ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1937 births Category:2019 deaths Category:German athletes Category:Olympic gold medalists for Germany Category:Sportspeople from Cologne
